General.Name: Phenix Optical Co Ltd
General.Description: Phenix Optical Company Limited produces and sells optical components and products in China and internationally. It operates in five segments, Optical Lens Elements, Optical Lenses, Photoelectric Modules, Batteries, and Scientific Instruments. The company offers optical lenses, including BI, FA, ITS, automotive, infrared, and smart hardware/home lens; biological, industry, fluorescence, polarized light, metallographic, electric, and digital microscopes; optoelectronic modules, such as security cameras, endoscopes, industrial cameras, car cameras, smart equipment, smart home, and other modules; optical and metal parts; and polymer, aluminum shell, and storage lithium-ion batteries. It also provides controllers of household electrical appliances, medical equipment controller, and industry controller; and intelligent integrated, biological, stereo, fluorescence, polarizing, metallographic, electric, and digital interactive microscope classroom microscope products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shangrao, China. Phenix Optical Company Limited is a subsidiary of Phenix Optics group Co., Ltd.
